caption.title: The average percent contribution of climatic variables to climatic suitability of IPS based on a Jackknife test in Maxent.
caption.p: Bio1, annual mean temperature (째C); Bio2, mean diurnal range (째C); Bio4, temperature seasonality; Bio5, maximum temperature of the warmest month (째C); Bio6, minimum temperature of the coldest month (째C); Bio12, annual precipitation (mm); Bio13, precipitation in the wettest month (mm); Bio14, precipitation in the driest month (mm); Bio15, precipitation seasonality (mm).
